column1: '''Arod''' was a light horse of [[Rohan]]. It bore a Knight of Rohan in [[Éomer]]'s [[éored]] that engaged the [[Orcs]] outside [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]. His rider was lost during the skirmish
column2: but Arod himself survived and remained with the rest of the éored on their way back. In [[the Wold]]

column1: Arod served his new rider faithfully
column2: and for much of this time
column3: Arod carried also Legolas's friend [[Gimli]]. At the [[Paths of the Dead]] Legolas spoke [[Elvish]] to calm the beast so that it would enter the [[Dark Door]].<ref>{{RK|V2}}</ref> Presumably he bore Legolas on his way throughout the [[War of the Ring]] and during the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]].<ref name=guide>{{HM|Guide}}

column2: there is also a [[Sindarin]] word ''arod'' meaning "noble"<ref>{{VT|41}} p.9</ref>.

column1: In ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''
column2: Arod is played by a white stallion named Percy. According to [[Orlando Bloom]]
column3: it was the friendliest horse on the set.
